mapper.insert: insert into pg_constraint (conname, connamespace, contype, condeferrable, condeferred, convalidated, conrelid, contypid, conindid, confrelid, confupdtype, confdeltype, confmatchtype, conislocal, coninhcount, connoinherit, conkey, confkey, conpfeqop, conppeqop, conffeqop, conexclop, conbin, consrc ) values (#{conname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{connamespace,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{contype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{condeferrable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{condeferred,jdbcType=BIT}, #{convalidated,jdbcType=BIT}, #{conrelid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{contypid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{conindid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{confrelid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{confupdtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{confdeltype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{confmatchtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{conislocal,jdbcType=BIT}, #{coninhcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{connoinherit,jdbcType=BIT}, #{conkey,jdbcType=ARRAY}, #{confkey,jdbcType=ARRAY}, #{conpfeqop,jdbcType=ARRAY}, #{conppeqop,jdbcType=ARRAY}, #{conffeqop,jdbcType=ARRAY}, #{conexclop,jdbcType=ARRAY}, #{conbin,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{consrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select conname, connamespace, contype, condeferrable, condeferred, convalidated, conrelid, contypid, conindid, confrelid, confupdtype, confdeltype, confmatchtype, conislocal, coninhcount, connoinherit, conkey, confkey, conpfeqop, conppeqop, conffeqop, conexclop, conbin, consrc from pg_constraint
